attributes.title: Uncomfortable
attributes.review: I tried to use this app to learn about my options this election. Not only was it not user friendly due to images unsuitable for the American people but it also fosters hate speech. the app took days to download it kept crashing. My screen would be unresponsive. Very disappointing. I’m not sure how much more of this review people will read but. Black lives matter. Say their names. This movement isn’t a moment it’s history happening be on the correct side. 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽✊🏽

attributes.title: Do not waste your time
attributes.review:
❌This is app is so bad. It took so long to download and when It finally did after about 4 hours it just glitched and turned my entire phone off. Navigating the app is a headache. Nothing is organized but what can you expect from Trumps team🤢 Please do not waste your time downloading this app. -82929/10. Who knows what kinda mambo jambo the team is plotting.
Delete this immediatley.

attributes.title: This app sucks✋🤤💫💦

attributes.title: I ALMOST DIED!!!!!
attributes.review: Not only did this app take WEEKS to load, give my phones TONS of viruses, and constantly play shakira’s “waka waka” song but this made my phone overhead to the point of EXPLODING WHILE I WAS DRIVING!! Almost resulting in an accident and 3rd degree burns. I would %100000 NOT recommend this app to ANYONE!!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is terrible. It glitches way too much. Also president Cheeto is a pedophile😍 love that. Anyways horrible app the Cheeto guy made me go blind so thanks for that🖕🏼10/10 do NOT recommend!!
